name: Glowing Garden
description:
Introduction

Glowing Garden is a 2D mushroom growing game. You play as Mico, a young mushroom sprite, as your world is in the midst of a magical surge. It's your job to gather magical nutrients - Mycos - and use them to sprout magical glowing mushrooms! Glowing garden is meant to be a mindful, relaxation experience. There is no end goal but to grow a garden of mushrooms. 

Gameplay

Mico can explore the overground mushroom forest and the magical soil underground. While overground, you can use your mouse cursor and left mouse button to walk horizontally. You can also use the right mouse button to jump.  

You can move freely between the overground and underground by digging through the soil.  

While underground you can expand your mycelium network in any direction by digging through the soil.  As you dig, you can also collect magical nutrients  used to grow bio-luminescent mushrooms on the surface. 

Resurfacing with these nutrients will sprout a mushroom buddy that grows  into a full mushroom over time.

Controls

Glowing Garden is meant to be played with mouse and keyboard. 

LEFT MOUSE BUTTON:  Move & Dig

RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON: Jump

ESCAPE: Pause Game

System Requirements: 

CPU:  X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support

GPU:  DX10, DX11, and DX12-capable GPUs OR Metal-capable Intel and AMD GPUs

RAM: 2 GB or more
